#labels Listener,Graph
= Response Times vs Threads <sup><font color=gray size="1">since 0.0.1</font></sup>=

[http://www.shorinternational.com/images/warning.gif] <font color="brown"><b>Don't forget to [PluginInstall#Configuration set up saving thread counts] when running in non-GUI mode!</b></font>

This graph shows how Response Time changes with amount of parallel threads. Naturally, server takes longer to respond when a lot of users requests it simultaneously. This graph visualizes such dependencies.
